pages.title: Mute & Unmute
pages.text: Your companion chats proactively when idle — commenting on surroundings, cracking jokes, or noting nearby events.$(br2)To silence this:$(br)$(thing)"shut up"$() / $(thing)"be quiet"$() / $(thing)"mute"$()$(br2)To re-enable:$(br)$(thing)"talk again"$() / $(thing)"unmute"$() / $(thing)"you can talk"$()$(br2)$(bold)Important:$() Muting only silences voluntary chatter. $(italic)Urgent messages$() (low health warnings, death notices, task completions) always come through.

pages.title: Idle Chat
pages.text: When not busy and not muted, the companion will occasionally speak up — roughly once per 10 minutes of idle time.$(br2)This is controlled by the $(bold)enableProactiveChat$() config option in the MCAi settings.$(br2)Idle chat uses the AI to generate context-aware remarks about biome, time of day, weather, and nearby entities.

pages.title: Bug Report Button
pages.text: In the companion's inventory screen, there is a $(bold)Bug Report$() button (GitHub icon).$(br2)Clicking it opens a pre-filled GitHub issue form in your browser, making it easy to report problems you encounter during gameplay.$(br2)This helps the developer track and fix issues quickly.
